song_comments.comment: The bassline in 'Billie Jean' is so catchy!
Michael Jackson's dance moves in the 'Billie Jean' music video are legendary.
Adele's voice in 'Someone Like You' is pure magic.
This song always brings tears to my eyes.
Eminem's flow in 'Lose Yourself' is unmatched.
'Lose Yourself' is a motivational anthem for anyone chasing their dreams.
The energy in 'Crazy in Love' is infectious!
